mapper.insert: insert into session_account_connect_attrs (PROCESSLIST_ID, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE, ORDINAL_POSITION) values (#{PROCESSLIST_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ATTR_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ATTR_VALUE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ORDINAL_POSITION,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select PROCESSLIST_ID, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE, ORDINAL_POSITION from session_account_connect_attrs
